title: Social Security in a World of Inflation and Investment Chaos
description: Inflation and market volatility has retirees scrambling to protect their personal finances. Join MarketWatch's retirement reporter Alessandra Malito and economist Laurence Kotlikoff as they discuss how to make sense of claiming Social Security and ways to make benefits last in the midst of the chaos.
